name: Princess Irene
storyline: Princess Irene is based off of the novel of the same name. Covering the events of the original novel, you control and play as Princess Irene Victoria Sor, eldest daughter of Ermond, the King of Sor, as well as a tomboy who is forcibly sent to the neighbouring country in order to become Princess Consort and clear the gambling debt her father's accumulated over the years. There, she meets and befriends other princesses, as well as the 1st prince himself and his confidantes. However, not all is as it seems, and those who wish to bring chaos to the land soon play their hand. Can Irene defeat the competition and take the place of Queen whilst its foundation crumbles?
summary: You, a tomboy princess preferring pants over skirts, sword fighting over dances. But in order to clear your country's debt, you must enter the Princess Consort Selection event, where only the best and beautiful is said to be chosen!
